[spb_parallax parallax_type=”video” bg_image=”14963″ bg_type=”cover” bg_video_mp4=”https://tasigroup.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/TASI-Test-and-Automation-Crop-Overlay-Light.mp4″ parallax_video_height=”content-height” parallax_video_overlay=”none” parallax_image_height=”content-height” parallax_image_movement=”fixed” parallax_image_speed=”0.5″ padding_horizontal=”15″ alt_background=”none” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]

 

 

World Leading Companies in Test, Inspection, Automation & Assembly.

 

 

 

 

 

[/spb_parallax] [fullwidth_text alt_background=”alt-four” el_class=”bb0 bt0 mt0 mb0 no-shadow no-arrow” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]

Our Businesses

Each TASI company delivers world-class products and services, focusing on our global customer needs in diverse market segments.

[/fullwidth_text] [clients item_count=”12″ category=”carousel” carousel=”yes” carousel_auto=”yes” pagination=”no” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”] [spb_text_block pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” el_class=”mt0 pt0″ width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]

Introducing TASI Test and Automation

As of January 1, 2024, TASI Group has been restructured into two individual organizations: TASI Test and Automation, and TASI Measurement. This structural change will have no impact on our customers—it will only augment and propel the industry-leading solutions and services you’ve come to expect from us.

Looking for the TASI Measurement site? Click here.

 

Learn more

[/spb_text_block] [spb_text_block pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” el_class=”mt0 pt0″ width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]

About TASI Test and Automation

TASI Test and Automation is comprised of three technologically advanced Strategic Business Segments commonly linked by a disciplined focus on Product Integrity, Packaging Integrity, and Automation. Our solutions range from IIoT enabled products such as real-time process monitoring, to leak test instrumentation and systems, bottle and can inspection, and automated assembly lines.

 

Read more

[/spb_text_block] [spb_parallax parallax_type=”image” bg_image=”14939″ bg_type=”cover” parallax_video_height=”content-height” parallax_video_overlay=”none” parallax_image_height=”content-height” parallax_image_movement=”fixed” parallax_image_speed=”0.5″ padding_horizontal=”15″ alt_background=”none” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]

World Class – World Wide

 

[/spb_parallax] [spb_text_block pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]

Markets

[/spb_text_block] [spb_single_image image=”14944″ image_size=”full” frame=”noframe” intro_animation=”none” full_width=”no” lightbox=”no” link_target=”_self” caption=”ENERGY” width=”1/3″ el_position=”first”] [spb_single_image image=”14947″ image_size=”full” frame=”noframe” intro_animation=”none” full_width=”no” lightbox=”no” link_target=”_self” caption=”AUTOMOTIVE” width=”1/3″] [spb_single_image image=”13754″ image_size=”full” frame=”noframe” intro_animation=”none” full_width=”no” lightbox=”no” link_target=”_self” caption=”FOOD & BEVERAGE” width=”1/3″ el_position=”last”] [spb_single_image image=”13756″ image_size=”full” frame=”noframe” intro_animation=”none” full_width=”no” lightbox=”no” link_target=”_self” caption=”PHARMA – BIOTECH – LAB” width=”1/3″ el_position=”first”] [spb_single_image image=”13723″ image_size=”full” frame=”noframe” intro_animation=”none” full_width=”no” lightbox=”no” link_target=”_self” caption=”CONSUMER” width=”1/3″] [spb_single_image image=”14948″ image_size=”full” frame=”noframe” intro_animation=”none” full_width=”no” lightbox=”no” link_target=”_self” caption=”MEDICAL DEVICES” width=”1/3″ el_position=”last”] [divider type=”dotted” text=”Go to top” full_width=”yes” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”] [spb_row wrap_type=”content-width” row_bg_type=”color” row_bg_color=”#ffffff” color_row_height=”content-height” bg_type=”cover” parallax_image_height=”content-height” parallax_image_movement=”fixed” parallax_image_speed=”0.5″ parallax_video_height=”window-height” parallax_video_overlay=”none” row_overlay_opacity=”0″ row_padding_vertical=”0″ row_padding_horizontal=”0″ row_margin_vertical=”0″ remove_element_spacing=”no” inner_column_height=”col-natural” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”] [blank_spacer height=”30px” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”] [spb_text_block pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]

Mission Statement

TASI Test and Automation operates on a relatively simple guiding philosophy that is embodied in the following five principles:

[/spb_text_block] [spb_accordion width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”] [spb_accordion_tab title=”Operational Excellence” accordion_id=”” icon=””] [spb_text_block pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]

TASI strives to instill in each of its businesses the goal to achieve maximum operational efficiencies, while providing world class product and customer service.

[/spb_text_block] [/spb_accordion_tab] [spb_accordion_tab title=”Global Expansion” accordion_id=”” icon=””] [spb_text_block pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]

TASI recognizes that it serves a very global customer base and must strive to serve those global customers wherever in the world they operate. With this in mind TASI has made significant investments to expand its reach in sales & service to all world regions.

[/spb_text_block] [/spb_accordion_tab] [spb_accordion_tab title=”Strong New Product Pipeline” accordion_id=”” icon=””] [spb_text_block pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]

TASI maintains an objective of achieving 25% of its product revenues from new products released in the last three years, insuring that each product line is continually being refreshed and advanced to meet changing market demands.

[/spb_text_block] [/spb_accordion_tab] [spb_accordion_tab title=”New Market Development” accordion_id=”” icon=””] [spb_text_block pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]

Although TASI is a market leader is several market segments, it understands that growth through market diversification is necessary to avoid becoming too dependent on a few large markets. Each business is encouraged to diversify into new and growing market niches.

[/spb_text_block] [/spb_accordion_tab] [spb_accordion_tab title=”Acquiring Great Companies” accordion_id=”” icon=””] [spb_text_block pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]

TASI has not only acquired great companies, but has also helped them to achieve improved results. Each and every acquired company has improved its financial strength, its market strength, and its sales coverage to become an integral part of the TASI success story.

[/spb_text_block] [/spb_accordion_tab] [/spb_accordion] [blank_spacer height=”30px” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”] [/spb_row]
